name: Single Leg Romanian Deadlift

instructions.description: Stand on one leg with a slight bend in the knee, keeping the other leg slightly lifted behind you for balance.
Hinge at the hips and lower your torso while extending the lifted leg straight back, maintaining a straight line from head to heel.
Engage your hamstrings and glutes to return to the starting position, keeping your core tight throughout the movement.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions on one leg before switching to the other leg.

variations.description: Perform the exercise near a wall or sturdy surface for added support.
Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell in one hand while performing the movement to increase resistance.

commentsNotes: Ensure proper alignment of the spine throughout the exercise.
Focus on maintaining balance and stability during the movement.
Avoid rounding the back to prevent strain on the lower back.
Start with a comfortable range of motion and gradually increase as strength and flexibility improve.
